name: Miniplanets (Deluxe Edition)
description:
Miniplanets (Deluxe Edition) is a Special Edition of the basic cartridge release of Miniplanets. It includes:
  • Miniplanets
  • 3D keyring
  • Cardboard box
  • Full color manual
  • Postcard
  • PVC box with reversible cover
  • Translucent violet cartridge
The keyring and cardboard box are the two items exclusive to this edition, which cost € 10 more.
